product_name: C.A.M.P. USA Nano 22 Carabiner Rack Pack - Package of 6
long_description: The popular Nano carabiner is now lighter weight, stronger and more functional than ever. At only 22g, it's one of the lightest 'biners available and is ideal for racking gear or making quickdraws.
short_description: The popular Nano carabiner is now lighter weight, stronger and more functional than ever. At only 22g, it's one of the lightest 'biners available and is ideal for racking gear or making quickdraws.
